import sys
import math
T = int(input())
for _ in range(T):
    s = input()
    a = s.count('01')
    b = s.count('10')
    if a == b:
        print(len(s) - 2)
    else:
        print(2)

t = int(input())
for _ in range(t):
    s = input()
    c1 = s.count('01')
    c2 = s.count('10')
    c = 2
    if c1 == c2:
        c = len(s) - 2
    print(c)

for i in range(int(input())):
    x = input()
    l = len(x)
    print(2 if x[0] != x[-1] else l - 2)

for i in range(int(input())):
    x = input()
    l = len(x)
    print(2 if x[0] != x[-1] else l - 2)

t = int(input())
i = 0
while i < t:
    s = input()
    a = s.count('01')
    b = s.count('10')
    if a == b:
        print(len(s) - 2)
    else:
        print(2)
    i = i + 1
